meanings.definition: The part of the brain that is involved in olfaction.
meanings.sent1: The rhinencephalon helps us smell different scents.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the rhinencephalon to understand our sense of smell.
meanings.sent3: The rhinencephalon must be happy when we enjoy the aroma of fresh flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were stored in the rhinencephalon, like a fragrant library.
meanings.sent5: The rhinencephalon is like a detective, deciphering the odors around us.

meanings.definition: The olfactory portion of the brain.
meanings.sent1: When you smell a rose, your rhinencephalon is at work.
meanings.sent2: The rhinencephalon is crucial for detecting different scents.
meanings.sent3: I wonder if the rhinencephalon dreams of pleasant smells at night.
meanings.sent4: Her rhinencephalon was like a bloodhound, tracking down the source of the delicious aroma.
meanings.sent5: The rhinencephalon is a magical gateway to a world of fragrances.
